summary: This mod is a recreation of the item "Dragon Defender" in OldSchool Runescape.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a recreation of the item "Dragon Defender" in OldSchool Runescape. Currently it is in it's early stages, I will probably offer a HD version with custom textures and turn the Dagger into a shield in the future ( Winter 2018 BTW)


if there are any issues tell me and ill try to fix them ASAP.

The Dragon Defender Dagger needs these items/skill to craft it

1 dragon bone
1 corundum ingot
1 ebony ingot
4 leather strips
Daedric Smithing Perk

The Dragon Defender Shield you need to kill Giants to obtain it, it's a 1/4 drop rate so hopefully you wont go dry for too long :)

The shield version offers the defensive stats of a Steel Shield, but a 40% increase in damage to main hand. Making it one of the most powerful items in the game (reason you cannot make it)


any feed back or suggestions you can message me on RuneScape

RSN: UFOs
author: No1shome
